Nasogastric feeding.sentence: The nurse gathers all necessary equipment for nasogastric feeding.
Nasogastric feeding.subject: The nurse
Nasogastric feeding.object: all necessary equipment for nasogastric feeding
Nasogastric feeding.tools: nasogastric tube, lubricant, syringe, feeding formula, gloves

Nasogastric feeding.sentence: The nurse explains the procedure to the patient to obtain informed consent.
Nasogastric feeding.subject: The nurse

Nasogastric feeding.sentence: The nurse positions the patient in a comfortable semi-upright position to facilitate feeding.
Nasogastric feeding.subject: The nurse
Nasogastric feeding.object: the patient in a comfortable semi-upright position

Nasogastric feeding.sentence: The nurse measures the length of the nasogastric tube before insertion to ensure proper placement.
Nasogastric feeding.subject: The nurse
Nasogastric feeding.object: the length of the nasogastric tube before insertion

Nasogastric feeding.sentence: The nurse securely attaches the nasogastric tube to the feeding syringe and initiates the feeding process.
Nasogastric feeding.subject: The nurse
Nasogastric feeding.object: the nasogastric tube to the feeding syringe and initiates the feeding process
Nasogastric feeding.tools: nasogastric tube, feeding syringe, feeding formula
